folder: Gun Hill Road (East) & Perry Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Gun Hill Road (East) - Perry Avenue
text:
300 E. Gunhill Road, at the S.E. corner of Perry Avenue, showing the Carmelite Sisters Chapel.

June 6, 1928.

P. L. Sperr
